title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; identical API surface to Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package; use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval, agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode) packaged as a single Docker image.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, async & reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive Rust CLI for chatting, pulling, and benchmarking Ollama models with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot template that streams Ollama responses using Vercel AI SDK.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama + GPU containers for CI-based LLM testing.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, generate flashcards, or brainstorm using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that answers threads via Ollama with per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Go-based Telegram bot; group-aware, streaming replies, optional auth via /auth command.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama generators and embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that calls Ollama for human-task summarization or DMN decision suggestions.

title: ollama-mlflow
summary: MLflow example showing how to log and compare Ollama model variants with metrics & artifacts.

title: ollama-rag-langchain-mongodb
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings, LangChain, and MongoDB Atlas Vector Search.
